Dialogue: Still sleeping, mama? So silly! I gave you good parts this time!
Mhmhmh nothing to worry about, mhm, nothing at all. I will help you feel better mama, I promise! Mhm, just need some pieces, mhm, better pieces.
Fix you up I will, mhm, fix you right up. But how? All of these parts are bad! Where are the good parts, mama? Hmm? Where? You can tell me, right mama?
Why NOT?! Please, mama, tell me! Why do you only sleep? Why do you leave me alone?! How could you leave me? So alone? I am so alone mama. I miss you so much.
Just need more parts is all. Better parts. Mama deserves the best.
